amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A of House Report 115-783 to provide $30M for the National Security Technology Accelerator, to support national security innovation and entrepreneurial education programs at universities. Reduces Operations and Maintenance-Defense Wide by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lipinski amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Lipinski.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lipinski amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
